lead_paragraph: The University of Southern California has complained that ABC’s Brent Musburger revealed privileged information in play-by-play commentary during Saturday’s victory against Nebraska. The university sent a letter to ESPN, which oversees sports programming on ABC. The letter said that Musburger, with less than 10 minutes to play and the Trojans leading, 21-10, began describing how U.S.C. quarterback John David Booty lets receivers know he has spotted a certain kind of coverage by using a thumb and little-finger gesture.
